Description:
Low-poly, super lightweight model of a luxury cruise ship. Can be used for virtually anything, from decorating archviz scenes to mobile games. Materials set up for Unity's Standard Shader system. All images rendered in Unity!
Model stats:
8831 triangles | 282 triangles LOD
2048x1024 texture set
Package includes:
- Model set up in prefabs
- 2 color variations
- Template for modifying the textures with your custom ship name / company logo
Additional goodies:
- Comes set up with rotating radar antennas
- Illumination map for nice night scenes
